concepts.name: Goal
concepts.description: The ultimate objective. Reaching this is good.

concepts.name: Lava
concepts.description: Extremely hot, molten rock. Do not touch.

concepts.name: Door
concepts.description: A barrier that can sometimes be opened.

concepts.name: Switch
concepts.description: An object that may affect other objects in the environment, like doors.

concepts.name: Agent
concepts.description: Another entity like myself. Could be friend or foe.

concepts.name: Untagged
concepts.description: An object with no specific meaning.

concepts.name: Interactable
concepts.description: A generic object that can be interacted with.
